00022 #include "mt/proto/smpp/pdu/unbind_resp.hpp"
00023 
00026 Smpp::UnbindResp::UnbindResp() :
00027     Response(CommandLength(MinLength),
00028               CommandId(CommandId::UnbindResp),
00029               CommandStatus(CommandStatus::ESME_ROK),
00030               SequenceNumber::Min)
00031 {
00032 }
00033 
00037 Smpp::UnbindResp::UnbindResp(const CommandStatus& commandStatus,
00038                       const SequenceNumber& sequenceNumber) :
00039     Response(CommandLength(MinLength),
00040               CommandId(CommandId::UnbindResp),
00041               commandStatus,
00042               sequenceNumber)
00043 {
00044 }
00045 
00048 Smpp::UnbindResp::UnbindResp(const Smpp::Uint8* b) :
00049     Response(CommandLength(MinLength),
00050               CommandId(CommandId::UnbindResp),
00051               CommandStatus(CommandStatus::ESME_ROK),
00052               1)
00053 {
00054     decode(b);
00055 }
00056 
00057 Smpp::UnbindResp::~UnbindResp()
00058 {
00059 }
00060 
00064 const Smpp::Uint8*
00065 Smpp::UnbindResp::encode()
00066 {
00067     buff_.reset(Header::command_length());
00068     Response::encode(buff_); // insert the header first
00069     Header::encode_tlvs(buff_);
00070     return buff_.get();
00071 }
00072 
00076 void
00077 Smpp::UnbindResp::decode(const Smpp::Uint8* buff)
00078 {
00079     Response::decode(buff);
00080 
00081     Smpp::Uint32 len = Response::command_length();
00082     Smpp::Uint32 offset = 16;
00083     const char* err = "Bad length in unbind_resp";
00084     if(len < offset)
00085         throw Error(err);
00086 
00087     Header::decode_tlvs(buff + offset, len - offset);
00088 }
